start-dialogue-0: Thirsty? KD10 has tons of delicious drinks!
start-dialogue-1: Kaohsiung Port Depot has all the fun and yummy things!
start-dialogue-2: I ate so much yummy food at Kaohsiung Port Depot, my tummy is full!
start-dialogue-3: Kaohsiung Port Depot is full of artisanal food and creative shops!
start-dialogue-4: This place is amazing! I'm taking lots of pictures to share with everyone!
start-dialogue-5: For souvenirs, Great Harbor Bridge Pastry is the best!
